column4: hi, i just upgraded from 10.04 to 10.10 and my sound is really quiet...  i looked online and found suggestions i recompile the kernel.  is there a simpler way to fix it?
check the update manager, software-sources, and see if upgrade is set to normal ( bottom line )
yep, it's set to normal.  though yesterday it didn't think there were any updates at all, now it says there are 165 updates and it's running through them.
